data.actual_result: It says you are already in a HS house; the same one that Account A was in [visual bug]
data.expected_result: You should not be in a HS house and should be prompted to take the test
data.short_description: Already in a HypeSquad house after logging into an account who wasnt in HypeSquad before
data.steps_to_repro: - Log into Account A, who isn't in a HS house - Go to the HS tab - Complete the HS test - Log out - Log into Account B, who also isn't in a HS house - Go to the HS tab
